content: Hey folks, I notice that Backend::define_function() now takes a TrapSink as an argument, meaning we can no longer just ask cranelift-faerie to use its built-in sink. I was wondering if there's a recommended migration path for this, or if we need to be rolling our own trap sink now in Lucet?

Context: https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/1389

change Module::define_function to take TrapSink instances by froydnj 路 Pull Request #1389 路 bytecodealliance/wasmtime
